item.title: One work accepted by Nature Medicine
item.description: The first AI-driven screening for pancreatic cancer.

item.title: Our work get accepted by Annals of Surgery/Radiology
item.description: The work about automated survival prediction and lymph node metastasis in pancreatic cancer get accepted by Annals of Surgery / Radiology.

item.title: Work for oncology accepted by CCR
item.description: Deep learning for fully-automated prediction of overall survival in patients with oropharyngeal cancer using FDG PET imaging: an international retrospective study. Inference Model and Codes are available !
